appsGate.lig.manager.communication
Class CommunicationManager

java.lang.Object
  org.glassfish.grizzly.websockets.WebSocketAdapter
      org.glassfish.grizzly.websockets.WebSocketApplication
          appsGate.lig.manager.communication.CommunicationManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
SendWebsocketsService, AddListenerService, org.glassfish.grizzly.websockets.WebSocketListener
public class CommunicationManager
extends org.glassfish.grizzly.websockets.WebSocketApplication
implements AddListenerService, SendWebsocketsService

This class is the manager for all web sockets connections. All external applications will communicate with ApAM components through an instance of this class.

Since:
February 8, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
See Also:
AddListenerService, SendWebsocketsService

                                                               org.glassfish.grizzly.websockets.WebSocketListener... listeners)
This method is call to create a new web socket. it is called by the web socket engine each time a client start a connection.

Overrides:
createSocket in class org.glassfish.grizzly.websockets.WebSocketApplication
Parameters:
handler - the Protocolhandler set by the web socket engine
listeners - the set of listeners for this sockets
